content: crochet your own linen stitch dishcloth with this free and easy-to-follow pattern made with medium weight cotton yarn and a 4 mm hook this textured square works up fast and makes a great gift or addition to your home perfect for beginners **unique features-** beginner-friendly pattern for new crocheters detailed photo tutorial and written instructions included uses classic cotton yarn for a soft and durable dishcloth **materials needed-** hook 4mm us size 6 0 yarn classic cotton aran weight 63-65 yards gauge 19 stitches by 17 row = 4 inches in linen stitch this is just one of the
